text: [Music]
it's the winter of 1890 Dr William howad
is the chief surgeon at John's Hopkins
Hospital the scrub nurse underhouse a
woman named Caroline Hampton begins to
develop a severe reaction to the strong
disinfectants used to scour her hands
and arms before
surgery howad takes an interest in her
plate in a moment of vision he asks
Goodyear Rubber Company to experiment
with the production of a pair of thin
rubber
gloves they fit Caroline well like
gloves and her hands begin to
recover in fact the gloves are such a
success that the good doctor orders more
for his team and for
himself from these early experiments a
multibillion dollar rubber glove
industry is born and it turns out the
doctor didn't just want to protect the
nurse's hands he also wanted to take
them in holy
matrimony howad and Caroline were
married just a few months after he gave
her that first pair of
[Music]
[Music]
gloves
